page.title: 09Sports and Hobbies
page.content:
We found that swimming was the most popular sport in the school and computer games were a close second in popularity. Most people in our school go swimming at Horsham although some go to Cranleigh and some go to the Atlantic Swimming Club at Horsham.
There are many different computer games including Decathlon, Ghostbusters, Rocket Roger, Jet Set Welly, Air Wolf, American Football, Tennis, Squash, Boxer and Snapper, Snooker. The most popular are Decathlon and Ghostbusters.
The games children play at playtime include football, cricket, French skipping, rope skipping, bulldogs, kingsey, touch once, scrambles, badminton, break dancing, running, 40-40, handstands, cartwheels. The
